name: Always The Same Level
description:
Run, Jump, Fight, Die, Think, Find the solution, and go the the next level ! 

You want some good challenges ? You like plateformer games ? 

 Try Always The Same Level ! 

Game Description : 

Plateformer made with C# and MonoGame

This is an Alpha of Always the Same Level, it contains the first 30 levels!

How to play : 

Keyboard : 

- Arrow keys to move 

- Space or Up key to jump (you can double jump)

- Enter to put the pause screen

- X  to shoot with the gun (since level 10 and more)

- Left Shift to activate/desactivate the jetpack (since level 10 and more)

- Left Ctrl to switch equipment (gun/bomb) (since level 20 and more)

XBox360 Controller :

- Left Stick to move

- Button A to jump (you can double jump)

- Start to put the pause screen

- Button X to shoot with the gun (since level 10 and more)

- Button LT to activate/desactivate the jetpack (since level 10 and more)

- Button RT to switch equipment (gun/bomb) (since level 20 and more)
